forms.customHeadContent:
<style>
  div.bootstrap-select button {
  	background-color: #fff;
    border-color: #ccc;
    color: #555;
  }
  div.bootstrap-select button:hover {
  	background-color: #fff;
    color: #555;
  }
  .open>.dropdown-toggle.btn-default {
  	background-color: #fff;
    color: #555;
  }
  .bootstrap-select.btn-group .dropdown-menu {
    z-index: 3000 !important;
  }
  .bootstrap-select.btn-group .dropdown-menu.inner {
      position: static !important;
  }
</style>
forms.description: Template used for creating new forms.
forms.name: Invite Others

elements.name: Add Users Tables
elements.text:
Invite others to kinops

The form below will help you quickly invite your teammates to join kinops.

Note: You only need to provide an email address to invite someone. They can configure their profiles once they sign in. Configuring someone as a "Space Admin" will give them full admin access to the system.



Email (required) Roles Teams Space Admin
View & edit current kinops users here.

elements.name: Username
elements.label: Username (Email)
elements.requiredMessage: Please enter your username

pattern.message: Usernames must be a valid email address.

elements.name: Already have a token
elements.text: I already have a reset token.

elements.name: Check Email
elements.text:
Check your Email

In a few moments you should receive an email which will allow you to reset your password.

If you don't receieve an email, contact your kinops administrator.

forms.description: Store of date formats for Notifications
forms.name: Notification Dates

elements.name: Name Explanation
elements.text: The Name of the date format is the name you will be including in your message templates inside the ${"${format('DateName')}"} tag. It should likely be something human readable and short but descriptive, like ShortDatewithTime.

elements.name: Format Explanation
elements.text: The date format should be a ruby date format such as %m-%e-%y %H:%M for 03-17-16 15:19. Examples and explanation can be found at http://www.foragoodstrftime.com/

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be an administrator.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Admins
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
/* 
 * Space admins are allowed access regardless of the the result of security 
 * policies.  Returning 'false' denies anyone but a space access. 
 */
false

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be an assigned individual to view this submission.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Assigned Individual

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be a member of the assigned team or the assigned individual.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Assigned Team - Assigned Individual

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be a member of the assigned team, the assigned individual, or explicitly added as an observer.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Assigned Team - Assigned Individual - Observers

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be authenticated.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Authenticated Users
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: identity('authenticated')

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the contractor role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Contractors

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the contractor or vendor role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Contractors - Vendors

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the data admin role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Data Admins

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the employee role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Employees

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the employee or contractor role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Employees - Contractors

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Everyone is allowed access.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Everyone
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: true

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the form developer role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Form Developers

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be the kapp owner or form owner.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Form Owners - Kapp Owners

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be a kapp owner.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Kapp Owners

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the submission support role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Submission Support

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be the user that created the submission.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Submitter
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
(submission('anonymous') && identity('sessionToken') == submission('sessionToken'))
|| (!submission('anonymous') && identity('username') == submission('createdBy'))

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be the submitter, form owner, or explicitly added as an observer.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Submitter - Form Owners - Observers

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the vendor role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Vendors

forms.name: Space

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be an administrator.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Admins
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
/* 
 * Space admins are allowed access regardless of the the result of security 
 * policies.  Returning 'false' denies anyone but a space access. 
 */
false

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be authenticated.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Authenticated Users
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: identity('authenticated')

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Everyone is allowed access.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Everyone
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: true

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be the user that created the submission.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Submitter
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
(submission('anonymous') && submission('sessionToken') == identity('sessionToken'))
|| (!submission('anonymous') && submission('createdBy') == identity('username'))

elements.text: WARNING!!! Renaming an environment will break emails that reference this space. Proceed with caution.

elements.name: New Space Slug
elements.label: New Space Slug
elements.requiredMessage: New Space Slug is required

pattern.message: Must be a valid slug (lower case alpha, numeric, and hyphens only)

constraints.content: values('New Space Slug') != values('Space Slug') && ['app','kinetic-bridgehub','kinetic-filehub','manage'].indexOf(values('New Space Slug')) == -1
constraints.message: New Space Slug cannot be the same as the existing space slug, and cannot be 'app', 'kinetic-bridgehub', 'kinetic-filehub', or 'manage'

events.name: Ensure Space Doesn't Exist

forms.description: Form that holds fields for bridge searching and other resources that are shared across forms.
forms.name: Shared Resources

elements.name: Information
elements.text:
Purpose

The purpose of the Shared Resources form is to define common bridged resources that will be used on more than one form.

Additional Info

This form is not meant to be a submittable form, hence the reason there is no submit button.

forms.description: Updates the task handler info property values in the specified space.
forms.name: Update Task Handler Properties in Space

elements.name: Warning
elements.text: WARNING!!! Updating handler properties will overwrite any changes the customer made to the handler in their space. Proceed with caution.

elements.name: Handler Definition Id
elements.label: Handler Definition Id
elements.requiredMessage: The Handler Definition Id is required

elements.name: Info Properties
elements.label: Info Properties (JSON Object - property name / property value)

elements.name: Reason
elements.label: Reason
elements.requiredMessage: Provide a reason why the handler properties are being updated

choices.label: Manual Override (Choose if you don't want to select a space from the list)

elements.name: Space Slug
elements.label: Space Slug
elements.required: values('Update in All Spaces') == "No" && values('Manual Override').indexOf("True") > -1
elements.requiredMessage: A Space is required when submitting this form

pattern.message: Must be a valid slug (lower case alpha, numeric, and hyphens only)

elements.name: Space List
elements.label: Space List
elements.required: values('Update in All Spaces') == "No" && values('Manual Override').indexOf("True") <= -1
elements.requiredMessage: A Space is required when submitting this form

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of the current space template being used to capture updates.
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Current Space Template Slug

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Defines whether the Kapp is configured. Value is automatically managed by the Setup Wizard. DO NOT MODIFY.
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Kapp Configuration Status

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be an administrator.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Admins
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
/* 
 * Space admins are allowed access regardless of the the result of security 
 * policies.  Returning 'false' denies anyone but a space access. 
 */
false

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be authenticated.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Authenticated Users
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: identity('authenticated')

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Everyone is allowed access.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Everyone
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: true

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be the user that created the submission.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Submitter
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
(submission('anonymous') && submission('sessionToken') == identity('sessionToken'))
|| (!submission('anonymous') && submission('createdBy') == identity('username'))

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be an administrator.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Admins
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
/* 
 * Space admins are allowed access regardless of the the result of security 
 * policies.  Returning 'false' denies anyone but a space access. 
 */
false

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be authenticated.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Authenticated Users
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: identity('authenticated')

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Everyone is allowed access.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Everyone
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: true

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of this spaces Admin Kapp (typically admin)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Admin Kapp Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Cluster used for housing response and task containers
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: AWS ECS Cluster

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Property File Used by the Provisioner
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: AWS Property File

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Region in which this kinops instance lives
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: AWS Region

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: AWS Bucket which holds tenant spaces
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: AWS Tenant S3 Bucket

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of this spaces Catalog Kapp (typically catalog)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Catalog Kapp Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the company that owns this space. May also be an environment name.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Company Name

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of headers and footers
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Footer Bundle Path

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of headers and footers
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Header Bundle Path

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Email address used to notify sales of new customer sign ups.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: kinops Sales Email Address

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Email Address Used to notify support of issues.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: kinops Support Email Address

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of libraries between bundles.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Libraries Bundle Path

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Brand name to put in titles, e.g. kinops.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Page Title Prefix

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Url of this spaces workflow engine
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Server Url

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the source for this space in the workflow engine
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Source Name

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Url of the request web server that this space exists
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Web Server Url

teamAttributeDefinitions.description: True or False if this team should be used in Queue Kapp Assignments
teamAttributeDefinitions.name: Assignable

teamAttributeDefinitions.description: The guid of the response discussion used by this team.
teamAttributeDefinitions.name: Discussion Id

teams.description: Users with this role are identified as vendors and given vendor permissions.
teams.name: Role::Vendor

teams.description: Users with this role are identified as contractors and given contractor permissions.
teams.name: Role::Contractor

teams.description: Users with this role are considered Employees, and have access to request things from the Service Catalog.
teams.name: Role::Employee

teams.description: Form developers are Users who are able to create and modify forms within the system.
teams.name: Role::Form Developer

teams.description: Users with this role are able to modify data within the Admin Kapp's Datastores.
teams.name: Role::Data Admin

teams.description: Users with this role have access to modify workflow in the task engine.
teams.name: Role::Task Developer

userProfileAttributeDefinitions.description: Used to configure which guided tour should be displayed
userProfileAttributeDefinitions.name: Guided Tour
